extendedInfo.description: Ligue 1 Explorer is a mobile news portal where you can find your favorite French football teams, matches, league table, league schedule or live scores. You will also find a football betting odds, articles, tweets or videos in seconds from a variety of trusted sources. Enjoy the fast and easy way to navigate the French Ligue 1 with our Explorer, completely free.We support Ligue 1, Ligue 2 and Champions League in this app.NEWWe have added FREE Notifications - GOAL alerts for your favourite team (since ver.2.0)Content:>> All French football Ligue 1 clubs>> Ligue 1, Ligue 2 and Champions League schedule - Simply add a selected event into your calendar>> Ligue 1 and Ligue 2 Live Scores & League tables - Real Live Scores refreshed every 2 minutes, including goal-scorers, yellow cards,â¦>> Notifications - Real Goal alerts for your favourite team. (Go to Settings / Notifications Goal Alerts)>> Results history - We keep track of all previous French Ligue 1 results for the season 2011/12>> Odds comparison - Information about betting odds and Visual odds Power graph for all punters>> Fan Photo / Video Gallery - Share your best moments with other fans and win football jersey every month>> The most recent articles, tweets, or videos>> Fast processing, simple to use and mobile friendly design- No affiliation with any 3rd party content inside this app- No hidden costs or charges- Only commercial element in this app is AD banner served from time to time by AdMob network.We look forward to hearing your feedback about our French leagues app!Please contact us at media@sportexplorer.mobiEnjoy our app!Best Regards,developers

reviews.title: Very good!
reviews.comment: Scores, table, news, odds and more in one place. Has sd support & not too big. Almost a perfect futbol app!
reviews.author: A Google User
